title: Crime Alert
description: Reenactments of real crimes and wanted perpetrators. Call the hotline if you have information about these dangerous criminals.
quote: Remember, keep your eyes open and stay alert!
altHero: host Wade Anders in a suit, points at the camera
alt1: a group of women on set answering phones
alt2: a man and woman look at each other passionately
alt3: the same man and woman now smiling at each other over a dead body
alt4: the man and women in stillframe behind Wade Anders sitting on a desk
